email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to provide you with a freight quote for the shipment of 85,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. The vessel proposed for this shipment is MV SEA HORIZON, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 290m.

Our initial quote stands at USD 18.50 per metric ton. The vessel will be available for loading from October 20 to October 25. Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Alex Fernandez
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the quote. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 17.50 per MT? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the vessel's loading speed?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 17.75 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day, pro rata. The vessel's loading speed is 10,000MT per day.

Please let us know if this revised rate is acceptable so we can proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Alex Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the revised quote. We accept the rate of USD 17.75 per MT. Could you please confirm the laycan period and provide the vessel's full set of certificates for our review?

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Laycan and Vessel Certificates for MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your confirmation. The laycan period remains as October 20 to October 25. Attached are the vessel's full set of certificates for your review.

Please let us know if you need any further information to proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Alex Fernandez

[ATTACHMENTS: vessel_certs.pdf]

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Iron Ore Shipment Agreement: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

We have reviewed the vessel's certificates and everything looks in order. Please proceed with the booking as discussed. We look forward to a smooth operation.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
